## apiKeyAuth() function

This provides a simple authorization mechanism based on a single pre-shared API key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function apiKeyAuth({ apiKey }: { apiKey: string }): Router
```

## Parameters

| Parameter  | Type                | Description |
| ---------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| { apiKey } | { apiKey: string; } |             |

**Returns:**

Router
